mapper.select: SELECT USER_NO AS userNo , USER_ID AS userId , PASSWORD AS userPwd , USER_NAME AS userName , EMAIL AS email , PHONE_NUMBER AS phone , ADDRESS_DETAIL AS address , JOINED_AT AS enrollDate , POINTS AS points , IS_DELETED AS isDelete , CREATED_AT AS createAt , UPDATED_AT AS updateAt FROM MEMBER_GENERAL WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND IS_DELETED = 'N'
